data.name: Creative Frameworks to get Clients Fast
data.summary:
Learn hacks, creative frameworks and a simple system to get clients in the next 21 days, even if you have never done it before
This is a free-webinar before the start of our Solopreneur Bootcamp that starts on 3rd May.

Outcomes:
1. Pick your Niche with 3 questions
2. Turn worry into curiosity with our reframing tool
3. Connect with other peers and creators through personal reflection exercises
4. Why now is the best time to get started and grow your side hustle or consulting programs
